alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 6:35PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL LAUDERDALE AND CENTRAL COLBERT COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM CST... At 634 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cherokee, or 10 miles west of Tuscumbia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40-50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Cherokee, Underwood-Petersville, Posey Loop, Northwest Alabama Regional Airport, Mt Hester, and Srygley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern Alabama.
